text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Flying. Stuns everyone nearby. Instant-kills non-covered small Zombies and non-covered medium height zombies without headgear.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Everyone thinks Saucer is alien, but they are just really shy, that's why they doesn't blend in.

pages.title: ‚è≥ Contain Family
pages.text: $(#25228d)Saucers emit light to stun and capture Zombies below them.
